message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $120 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both of us.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to negotiate further. Based on our discussion, I would like to counter with a price of $100 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value of the item.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $95? I think this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our previous discussions.
